nodes.text: Bullies should not face legal repercussions
Bullying should be addressed through disciplinary action
Instead of imposing legal repercussions on bullying
Bullies should face legal repercussions in order to prevent further bullying and protect victims
As disciplinary action alone is insufficient to address the issue
